tweets.text:
During a sonar survey we discovered three fyke nets which are used for eel fishing.

The eel closed season is Dec 1 to March 31st which means these nets should not be being used. 

These were lost tackle so no one was actively using them but we will be taking enforcement action. https://t.co/pYnXCdltFk

The R. Misbourne at Bottom House Lane today, full of sewage and reeking to high heaven. Globally rare #chalkstream in the heart of the @ChilternsAONB @EnvAgency @ChilternSociety @Feargal_Sharkey @thameswater https://t.co/4Hr8tBwuBq

@anniekb @ChilternSociety @ChilternsAONB @EnvAgency @Feargal_Sharkey @thameswater @thameswater are pumping sewage from their balancing tanks upstream, into the Misbourne, to prevent surcharging into properties in Chalfont St. Peter.

tweets.text:
Meet 'Charlie Whiskey' - Lincolnshire Fire and Rescue's new multi-purpose vehicle and one of a kind!

As well as carrying water to remote fires, it also contains specialist equipment provided by @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @Cawrey @nickworth

Find out more:https://t.co/pyalGYu11j https://t.co/jsG0ZzPMQK

tweets.text: @acabbie @SpacePootler @RBourchier @MarcusxGrant @Photo_Iain @jenstridonkai @darrenmoore @WorldBollard @mariamartak @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @standardnews Hopefully people will soon start to take the tube and bus more often. Or realise, once the sun comes out, that a cycle into work is far better - provided they‚Äôre confident enough or have the right infrastructure to help them.

The coarse fish #CloseSeason starts today, meaning it‚Äôs illegal to fish for coarse fish in rivers until 15 June inclusive.  

We spoke to Fisheries Officer Matt Buck to find out why the close season is so important üëá

More info: https://t.co/u6IhTpkgUB #Angling https://t.co/wVVj0shIow

tweets.text:
@SpacePootler @RBourchier @MarcusxGrant @Photo_Iain @saddleblaze @jenstridonkai @darrenmoore @WorldBollard @mariamartak @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @standardnews In an ideal world yes but pics I've seen show awful traffic in lower Boston rd at times so not sure that many are making the shift.
Once everything reopens and we get a return to some semblance of normality I think we'll see how viable these schemes really are.

Information about Phases 2 and 3 of the #Kendal Flood Risk Management Scheme are now live on @TheFloodHub website. 

These dedicated web-pages give details about works taking place in Burneside, Staveley, Ings & the upstream storage measures. 

Link ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/WeIAMEzIBP https://t.co/al89yuzv4H

urls.title: Upper Kent | The Flood Hub
urls.description: The Environment Agency is delivering a proposed Flood Risk Management Sc heme to better protect homes and business from flooding in the Kent catchment, and improve the local environment and community amenities. Kendal is the first area to be delivered, followed by Burneside, Staveley, and Ings, and upstream measures including flood storage. In addition, Natural Flood Management measures are being integrated into the plans which aim to slow the flow of water and provide wider environmental benefits across

tweets.text: @acabbie @MarcusxGrant @Photo_Iain @saddleblaze @jenstridonkai @darrenmoore @WorldBollard @SpacePootler @mariamartak @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @standardnews My elderly in-laws live on Boston Road.  My wife & I used to invariably drive there.  Not now - 90%of trips are now by bike or on foot. The LTN works as it was designed to do! Those who can have need to cut the short journeys by car.

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

tweets.text: @acabbie @RBourchier @MarcusxGrant @Photo_Iain @saddleblaze @jenstridonkai @darrenmoore @WorldBollard @mariamartak @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @standardnews It clears the road for those who can't make the shift.  Everybody wins!

We've been visiting sections of the #Tipalt Burn again! It was great to see how this burn responds to heavy rainfall - the water levels were certainly very high! @NlandNP @nationaltrust @EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/7x6Gf12C05

Oh dear.

QC has a view that the @EnvAgency must proactively safeguard SSSIs, SACs from harm, like abstraction.

CEO of EA says no we don't.

Just days later @Defra issue guidance to the EA "You MUST NOT WAIT until a site is harmed to put conservation measures in place." Oops. https://t.co/elg6fIrmQs

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

tweets.text:
@RBourchier @MarcusxGrant @Photo_Iain @saddleblaze @jenstridonkai @darrenmoore @WorldBollard @SpacePootler @mariamartak @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @standardnews That's great if time, health and lifestyle allows you to do so, not so easy for some but if folk like yourself are doing it then those that can't should have a clearer road. Win/Win. 
I'll have to ask my mate how he's getting on with it all.

Tonight at 6pm we are on @LpoolLocalTV
with our partners the @EnvAgencyNW and @sthelenscouncil üå≥üèûÔ∏èüì∫ . We discuss the almost decade old willowed leaky dams at Sankey Valley Country Park which help slow the flow. Back then, these were some of the first in the regions lowlands. https://t.co/npzNlwbJ9S

domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

tweets.text: @MarcusxGrant @Photo_Iain @saddleblaze @jenstridonkai @darrenmoore @WorldBollard @SpacePootler @mariamartak @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @RBourchier @standardnews With respect I'm not hard of thinking so know exactly what the modus operandi is. It still means someone living on one side of the closures (a friend) who needs to visit an elderly relative (his mother) on the other side now has to take a lengthy diversion.

I'm going to take a wild guess and say this enormous snake of construction waste has not been deposited under the R1 waste exemption, eh, @WasteCrimeWatch? Seen today a few hundred yards west of Sanderstead recreation ground, South Croydon. @EnvAgencySE. https://t.co/N413w3YO9t
